translation.start.narration: Do you want to create a party of characters, start or resume an adventure?
translation.createParty.narration: How many do you have in your party?
translation.createCharacter.narration: This is your parties {charactersNumber}{numberEndings} character. Lets start with your Race first.
translation.elf.narration: You may select or get more info on Elves.
translation.dwarf.narration: You may select or get more info on Dwarves.
translation.elfInfo.narration: Your elf character has a variety of natural abilities, the result of thousands of years of elven refinement.
translation.dwarfInfo.narration: Your dwarf character has an assortment	of inborn abilities,	part and parcel	of dwarven nature. You want to know more about the age, alignment or size?
translation.dwarfAge.narration: Dwarves mature at the same rate as humans, but theyâ€™re considered young until they reach the age of 50. On average, they live about 350 years.
translation.dwarfSize.narration: Dwarves stand between 4 and 5 feet tall and average about 150 pounds. Your size is Medium.
translation.dwarfAlignement.narration:
Most	dwarves	are	lawful,	believing	
firmly	in	the	benefits	of	a	well-ordered	society.	They	
tend	toward	good	as	well,	with	a	strong	sense	of	fair	
play	and	a	belief	that	everyone	deserves	to	share	in	
the	benefits	of	a	just	order.
translation.too many.narration: I am sorry that is too many people to play.
translation.not enough.narration: You should have atleast one member.
